Title: Heart of the Issue
Description:
I can't believe how much Nari has been through. This perversion of our history, our culture... my family...

<Lysander glances at his sister.>

These demons came in here from somewhere. I'm certain the source of their invasion lies in the depths of our barrow den. You and I can put a stop to it.

I won't let this place haunt her any longer, $n.
ObjectivesText: Disrupt 4 Portals to the Twisting Nether in the depths of Shadow Hold.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Arko'narin Starshade in the depths of Shadow Hold
